versos: (safely) "Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may speed ahead and be honored, as happened among you, and that we may be delivered from wicked and evil men. For not all have faith. But the Lord is faithful. He will establish you and guard you against the evil one." - 2 Thessalonians 3:1-3;;;
(chase) Proverbs 28:1 - "The wicked flee though no one pursues, but the righteous are as bold as a lion.";;;
(abhor) Romans 12:9 - "Let love be genuine. abhor what is evil; hold fast to what is good.";;;
(pursueth) Psalm 23:6 - "Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the Lord for ever.";;;
(punish) Isaiah 13:11 - "I will punish the world for its evil, the wicked for their sins. I will put an end to the arrogance of the haughty and will humble the pride of the ruthless.";;;
(pride) Proverbs 16:18 - "pride goes before destruction, a haughty spirit before a fall.";;;
(chastise) Hebrews 12:6 - "For whom the Lord loves He chastens, And scourges every son whom He receives.";;;
(joktan) 1 Chronicles 1:20 - joktan was the father of Almodad
(odours) Leviticus 26:31 - And I will make your cities waste
(enjoy) Ecclesiastes 3:13 - "Moreover, when God gives someone wealth and possessions, and the ability to enjoy them, to accept their lot and be happy in their toilthis is a gift of God.";;;
(pine) Isaiah 41:19 - "I will set pines in the wasteland, the fir and the cypress together,";;;
(humbled) James 4:10 - Humble yourselves before the Lord
(ability) Matthew 25:15 - "To one he gave five talents, to another two, to another one, to each according to his ability. Then he went away.";;;
(homer) Ezekiel 45:14 - "The homer shall be the standard of measurement for volume for both liquid and dry measure.";;;
(dwellest) Psalm 91:1: "He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.";;;
(evils) Psalm 23:4 - "Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.";;;
(devoted) 1 Samuel 1:28 - "So now I give him to the Lord. For his whole life he will be given over to the Lord.";;;

(tithe) Malachi 3:10 - "Bring the whole tithe into the storehouse, that there may be food in my house. Test me in this," says the Lord Almighty, "and see if I will not throw open the floodgates of heaven and pour out so much blessing that there will not be room enough to store it.";;;
